description: Galbokka Hewage Chamith Lasantha and 1 Other Vs. Director General of Coast Conservation and Coastal Development and 5Others. before Hon.M. T. MOHAMMED LAFFAR
parties: Galbokka Hewage Chamith Lasantha and 1 Other Vs. Director General of Coast Conservation and Coastal Development and 5Others.
legistation: Article 140 of the Constitution of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka and Section 14 (1) of the Coast Conservation and Coastal Resources Management Act No. 57 of 1981 (as amended).
